name: spectro-tab-tools
description: VS Code extension that provides bulk, recursive, and customizable property sorting for TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, SCSS, SASS, LESS, JSON, YAML, and Go files

spectro-tab-tools.excludedLanguages.description: List of languages where the property sorter should be disabled.

spectro-tab-tools.includedFilePatterns.description: File patterns to include for property sorting (glob patterns).

spectro-tab-tools.excludedFilePatterns.description: File patterns to exclude from property sorting (glob patterns).

spectro-tab-tools.sortNestedObjects.description: Enable recursive sorting of properties in nested object declarations.

spectro-tab-tools.showDescendingOption.description: Show the 'Sort Properties Descending' option in the context menu.

spectro-tab-tools.css.groupByCategory.description: Group CSS properties by category (layout, typography, visual effects, etc.) before sorting alphabetically within each group.

spectro-tab-tools.css.preserveMediaQuery.description: Preserve the original order of media queries instead of sorting them.

spectro-tab-tools.css.sortNestedRules.description: Sort nested rules in SCSS/SASS/LESS files (e.g., &:hover, &::before).

spectro-tab-tools.css.groupVariables.description: Group CSS custom properties (variables) at the beginning of rule blocks.

spectro-tab-tools.css.preserveVendorPref.description: Preserve the standard order of vendor prefixes (-webkit-, -moz-, -ms-, -o-, standard).

spectro-tab-tools.css.sortAtRules.description: Sort @import, @use, @forward statements alphabetically in SCSS/SASS files.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.sortMethods.description: Method sorting preference for TypeScript classes. 'alphabetical' sorts by name, 'visibility' groups by public/private/protected, 'static-first' puts static methods first, 'lifecycle' follows component lifecycle order.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.separateInt.description: Handle interfaces and classes with different sorting rules when both are present in the same file.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.sortImports.description: Sort import and export statements alphabetically within their respective groups.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.groupImport.description: Group imports by type: external libraries, internal modules, relative imports.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.preserveMet.description: Preserve method chaining order when sorting object properties that contain method calls.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.sortConstru.description: Sort constructor parameters alphabetically while preserving dependency injection order.

spectro-tab-tools.typescript.prioritizeP.description: Sort public class members before private/protected members.

spectro-tab-tools.go.sortStructFields.description: Struct field sorting preference. 'alphabetical' sorts by name, 'by-type' groups by field type, 'by-size' orders by memory size, 'preserve-tags' maintains fields with struct tags together.

spectro-tab-tools.go.groupEmbeddedFields.description: Group embedded (anonymous) struct fields at the beginning of struct definitions.

spectro-tab-tools.go.sortMethodReceivers.description: Sort methods by receiver type name when multiple receiver types are present in the same file.

spectro-tab-tools.go.preserveStructTags.description: Preserve struct tag formatting and order when sorting struct fields.

spectro-tab-tools.go.groupByVisibility.description: Group exported (public) fields before unexported (private) fields in struct definitions.

spectro-tab-tools.go.sortInterfaceMethod.description: Sort method signatures alphabetically within Go interface definitions.

spectro-tab-tools.go.preserveMethodSets.description: Keep related methods together based on common functionality patterns.

spectro-tab-tools.json.sortObjectKeys.description: Sort object keys alphabetically in JSON files.

spectro-tab-tools.json.preserveArrayOrde.description: Preserve the original order of array elements instead of sorting them.

spectro-tab-tools.json.sortNestedObjects.description: Enable recursive sorting of properties in nested JSON objects.

spectro-tab-tools.json.customKeyOrder.description: Custom key order list for JSON objects. Keys matching these names will be sorted first in the specified order.

spectro-tab-tools.json.groupBySchema.description: Group JSON properties by common schema patterns (e.g., metadata, configuration, data).

spectro-tab-tools.json.preserveComments.description: Preserve comments in JSON files (JSONC format). Note: Standard JSON does not support comments.

spectro-tab-tools.sorting.caseSensitive.description: Enable case-sensitive property sorting. When disabled, properties are sorted ignoring case differences.

spectro-tab-tools.sorting.naturalSort.description: Enable natural sort order for properties containing numbers (e.g., 'item2' comes before 'item10').

spectro-tab-tools.sorting.customOrder.description: Custom property order list. Properties matching these names will be sorted first in the specified order.

spectro-tab-tools.sorting.groupByType.description: Group properties by their type (e.g., methods, properties, getters/setters) before sorting alphabetically within each group.

spectro-tab-tools.sorting.prioritizeRequ.description: Sort required properties (without '?' in TypeScript) before optional properties.

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.indentation.description: Indentation type to use. 'auto' detects from editor settings, 'spaces' uses spaces, 'tabs' uses tabs.
Number of spaces to use for indentation when using spaces (ignored for tabs).

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.lineEnding.description: Line ending style to use. 'auto' detects from file or uses platform default, 'lf' uses Unix-style (\n), 'crlf' uses Windows-style (\r\n).

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.preserveCom.description: Whether to preserve comments in the output. When disabled, all comments are removed.

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.commentStyl.description: Comment formatting style. 'preserve' keeps original style, 'single-line' converts to //, 'multi-line' converts to /* */.

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.propertySpa.description: Property spacing style. 'compact' uses minimal spacing, 'spaced' adds space around colons, 'aligned' aligns property values.

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.trailingCom.description: Trailing comma handling. 'preserve' keeps original, 'add' ensures trailing commas, 'remove' removes trailing commas.

spectro-tab-tools.formatting.blankLinesB.description: Add blank lines between different property groups (when groupByType is enabled).

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.sortObjectKeys.description: Sort object keys alphabetically in YAML files.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.preserveArrayOrde.description: Preserve the original order of array elements instead of sorting them.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.sortNestedObjects.description: Enable recursive sorting of properties in nested YAML objects.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.preserveAnchorsAn.description: Preserve YAML anchors (&anchor) and aliases (*alias) during sorting.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.preserveDocumentS.description: Preserve YAML document separators (---) and maintain multi-document structure.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.preserveStringSty.description: Preserve YAML string folding styles (|, >, |-, >-) and quoting styles.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.preserveComments.description: Preserve comments in YAML files during sorting.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.indentationStyle.description: YAML indentation style. 'auto' detects from file, '2-spaces' uses 2 spaces, '4-spaces' uses 4 spaces.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.handleComplexKeys.description: Handle complex keys (nested objects/arrays as keys) by preserving their structure during sorting.

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.customKeyOrder.description: Custom key order list for YAML objects. Keys matching these names will be sorted first in the specified order (e.g., ['apiVersion', 'kind', 'metadata', 'spec']).

spectro-tab-tools.yaml.groupBySchema.description: Group YAML properties by common schema patterns (e.g., Kubernetes: apiVersion/kind → metadata → spec → status, Docker Compose: version → services → networks/volumes).

editor/context.when: editorTextFocus && (resourceLangId == 'typescript' || resourceLangId == 'typescriptreact' || resourceLangId == 'javascript' || resourceLangId == 'javascriptreact' || resourceLangId == 'css' || resourceLangId == 'scss' || resourceLangId == 'sass' || resourceLangId == 'less' || resourceLangId == 'go' || resourceLangId == 'json' || resourceLangId == 'jsonc' || resourceLangId == 'yaml' || resourceLangId == 'yml')

editorTextFocus && config.spectro-tab-tools.showDescendingOption && (resourceLangId == 'typescript' || resourceLangId == 'typescriptreact' || resourceLangId == 'javascript' || resourceLangId == 'javascriptreact' || resourceLangId == 'css' || resourceLangId == 'scss' || resourceLangId == 'sass' || resourceLangId == 'less' || resourceLangId == 'go' || resourceLangId == 'json' || resourceLangId == 'jsonc' || resourceLangId == 'yaml' || resourceLangId == 'yml')

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.package: npm run check-docs && npm run build:prod && npx vsce package --skip-license
scripts.ci:test: npm run test:coverage && npm run report:performance
scripts.ci:report: npm run coverage && npm run report:performance
